desc: OMG offers superior quality products at low prices so you always save money and you still donate 5% or more of your spend to your defined charity. Buy what you need and save money so you can donate more without spending more. Donating to tax funded non profits (e.g. public schools) may even lower your local taxes.

layout.text: Get Great Value, Give to Your Worthy Cause

High quality products at lowest competitive prices
Donate to any charity you'd like
To maintain or lower your property taxes, donate to public schools
